books.author: by Michael Connelly
books.description: Renée Ballard, a young detective with the L.A.P.D., investigates crimes against two women.
books.name: THE LATE SHOW

books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: A whistleblower alerts a Florida investigator to judicial corruption involving the Mob and Indian casinos.
books.name: THE WHISTLER

books.author: by Ilona Andrews
books.description: The conclusion to the Hidden Legacy series.
books.name: WILDFIRE

books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: A search for stolen rare manuscripts leads to a Florida island.
books.name: CAMINO ISLAND

books.author: by Daniel Silva
books.description: Gabriel Allon, the Israeli art restorer and spy, now the head of Israel’s secret intelligence service, pursues an ISIS mastermind
books.name: HOUSE OF SPIES

books.author: by Ernest Cline
books.description: It’s 2044, life on a resource-depleted Earth has grown increasingly grim, and the key to a vast fortune is hidden in a virtual-reality world.
books.name: READY PLAYER ONE

books.author: by C J. Box
books.description: A North Dakota investigator pursues a trucker who preys on prostitutes.
books.name: PARADISE VALLEY

books.author: by Ruth Ware
books.description: A travel writer on a cruise is certain she has heard a body thrown overboard, but no one believes her.
books.name: THE WOMAN IN CABIN 10

books.author: by Ruth Ware
books.description: Four school friends come together as their long-held secret threatens to emerge.
books.name: THE LYING GAME

books.author: by James Patterson and others
books.description: A collection of three novels, each written with a different co-author.
books.name: THE MOORES ARE MISSING

books.author: by James Patterson and Howard Roughan
books.description: An expert on serial murder becomes involved in the hunt for a New York City killer who leaves a playing card at the crime scene.
books.name: MURDER GAMES

books.author: by Rupi Kaur
books.description: Poetic approaches to surviving adversity and loss.
books.name: MILK AND HONEY

books.author: by Margaret Atwood
books.description: Men and women in a dystopian future. The basis of the Hulu series; originally published in 1985.
books.name: THE HANDMAID'S TALE

books.author: by Lisa Jackson, Nancy Bush and Rosalind Noonan
books.description: Three friends reunite in Prairie Creek, Wyo., and are menaced by a killer from their past.
books.name: OMINOUS

books.author: by Marie Force
books.description: In the 11th book in the Fatal series of romantic thrillers, a lieutenant in the Washington Metro Police investigates a murder and defends the reputation of her husband, the vice president.
books.name: FATAL THREAT
